RESET_THIS_APP_EXPLANATION: Resetting this app will clear the Authentication Key and User information from this device. Once reset you can re-add this device to an existing user by clicking ‘Login’ or you can ‘Create a new account’.
PIN_EXPLANATION: This PIN will be used each time you login
ACTIVATE_DEVICE_SUBTEXT: We have sent a 6 digit activation code to your email
ADD_DEVICE_SUBTEXT: You need to authenticate this device by entering an activation code. Don’t worry this will only happen once per device.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_SUBTEXT: You have successfully logged in using Haventec Authenticate
USER_EXPERIENCE_MESSAGE: Did you enjoy that quick  authentication?
USER_EXPERIENCE_MESSAGE_SUBTEXT: You have just used a simple 4 digit PIN to Authenticate but what’s so special about it:
USER_EXPERIENCE_EXPLANATION_1: First off that PIN you entered is only known to you, it is not stored anywhere, not on this device or on Haventec’s servers. Nothing for an attacker to steal.
USER_EXPERIENCE_EXPLANATION_2: When you first signed up, we auto registered this device and placed a unique Authentication Key on it. See your security below for more details.
USER_EXPERIENCE_EXPLANATION_3: Every time you log in we rotate the Authentication Key. It’s like having a locksmith change your locks every time you enter your house.
USER_EXPERIENCE_EXPLANATION_4: Two factor authentication (2FA) out of the box. 2FA is something you know, your PIN and something you have, your device and it’s unique Authentication Key.
SECURITY_COPY: The Authentication key is unique to this application on this device. It automatically rotates every time you login. This greatly increases your security
RESET_YOUR_PIN_NOTE_1: We have sent a reset PIN code to your email address.
RESET_YOUR_PIN_NOTE_2: To reset your PIN, please enter that code here
CREATE_AN_ACCOUNT_NOTE: As this is your first time here, we need a few details
